pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. -*- mode: rst -*-:: .---. .-..-..-.,-. .--. : .; `: :; :`. .'`._-.' : ._.'`._. ;:_,._;`.__.' : : .-. : :_; `._.' 0.4.1 -- XenStore access the Python way!What is ``pyxs``?-----------------It's a pure Python XenStore client implementation, which covers all ofthe ``libxs`` features and adds some nice Pythonic sugar on top. Here'sa shortlist:* ``pyxs`` supports both Python 2 and 3,* works over a Unix socket or XenBus,* has a clean and well-documented API,* is writen in easy to understand Python,* can be used with `gevent <http://www.gevent.org>`_ or `eventlet <http://eventlet.net>`_.Installation------------If you have `pip <https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable>`_ you can do the usual:: pip install --user pyxsOtherwise, download the source from `GitHub <https://github.com/selectel/pyxs>`_and run:: python setup.py install
